definition: to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Grieved emotion is the heavy experience, it is difficult to disappear.
sentences.chinese: 哀怨情感内敛凝聚，是沉重的体验，易郁结不散。

sentences.english: Were you open with your co-workers and superiors, or did you keep it to yourself?How have your colleagues reacted?
sentences.chinese: 你们是否向同事和上司坦承此事，或是郁结于心？

sentences.english: Objective To develop a syndrome scale for Liver-qi stagnation syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的初步编制中医肝气郁结证证候量表。

sentences.english: Liver-Qi Stagnation can lead to the inflammatory pathological changes in gastric mucosa.
sentences.chinese: 肝气郁结可导致胃粘膜炎症性病理改变的产生。

sentences.english: Observation of two drugs on the treatment of dysthymia of stagnation of liver-QI clinical efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 观察两组药物对治疗恶劣心境肝气郁结证的临床疗效。

definition: pent-up frustrations/sth that has accumulated in one's mind for a long time
to feel oppressed/to be depressed/to feel dejected
to mediate/to reconcile/to make peace/to intervene
to relieve/to ease (pressure)/to alleviate/to remove/to get rid of
internal injury/disorder of internal organs (due to improper nutrition, overexertion etc)
